author: Tim Marcin
title: People are loving Blue Ivy's hand-washing PSA
description: Blue Ivy Carter — you know, the famous daughter of Beyoncé and Jay-Z — wants you to take hand washing seriously during the coronavirus crisis. The 8 year old posted, via grandma Tina's Instagram, a handy little science trick that doubled as an adorable PSA vi…
